context: Hi, what kinds of movies do you like?
Hello whats ur favorite movies? I like all movies
My favorite movie is Apollo 13 (1995) Great storytelling and thematics
If you like space movies you will enjoy it What is your favorite?
Not a big fan of them I don't have a favorite
My other favorites are Ever After (1998) and Stardust (2007)
I havent seen that one? What genre is it?
Its a good action/comedy with the Rock(Dwayne Johnson)
resp: Love the rock! Jumanji (2017) was good as well

:Got it! Since you enjoy action and comedy, here are some recommendations for you:

1. Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle
2. Central Intelligence
3. San Andreas
4. The Rundown
5. Fast & Furious Presents: Hobbs & Shaw
6. 21 Jump Street
7. The Other Guys
8. Guardians of the Galaxy
9. Deadpool
10. Kingsman: The Secret Service

I appreciate the recommendations, but I think I should mention a fantastic movie that combines action and comedy. It features a group of friends who get sucked into a video game and must navigate various challenges to escape. The film is known for its humor and adventure, and it stars Dwayne Johnson and Kevin Hart. It's a great watch if you're looking for something fun!

simulator_dialog.resp: Love the rock! Jumanji (2017) was good as well
